metadata.title: CVE-2023-42752 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - high
metadata.description:
An integer overflow flaw was found in the Linux kernel. This issue leads tothe kernel allocating `skb_shared_info` in the userspace, which isexploitable in systems without SMAP protection since `skb_shared_info`contains references to function pointers.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-42752` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-7-generic - 6.5.0-7.7
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-7-generic - 6.5.0-7.7
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-7-generic-64k - 6.5.0-7.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-aws - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1006-azure - 6.5.0-1006.6
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1006-gcp - 6.5.0-1006.6
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-8-lowlatency - 6.5.0-8.8.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-8-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-8.8.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1009-oracle - 6.5.0-1009.9
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1003-raspi - 6.5.0-1003.4
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1002-starfive - 6.5.0-1002.3
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1003-laptop - 6.5.0-1003.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-7.7').
linux-aws package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1007.7').
linux-azure package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1006.6').
linux-gcp package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1006.6').
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support, was pending [6.5.0-1006.6]').
linux-lowlatency package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-8.8.1').
linux-oracle package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1009.9').
linux-raspi package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1003.4').
linux-starfive package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1002.3').
linux-laptop package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1003.6').
